channel.title: [pi] dialogue maker helps you make dialogues
channel.description:
hey guys releasing a dialogue marker for pi guessing it would work with any server tbh this is for people who need help with dialogues <3
here is a picture off it and i was messing around making a random dialogue :) [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/SSScreenCapture041.png[/img]
[b]download link[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/ta8u767fvg3y/DialogueMaster.rar]http://uppit.com/ta8u767fvg3y/DialogueMaster.rar[/url]

thanks for the comments guys

item.title: [pi] dialogue maker helps you make dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:19, topic:431308”][quote author=liamp link=topic=533984.msg3903920#msg3903920 date=1328040410]

I like this but I don’t like the spacing in it. You could fix that so instead of having it like this:

       case ####:
  sendNpcChat#("#", c.talkingNPC, "name");
  c.nextChat = #;

break;

make it look like this:

case ####:
	sendNpcChat#("#", c.talkingNPC, "name");
	c.nextChat = #;
break;

hmmm it still works tho
[/quote]
In what is this written?[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] dialogue maker helps you make dialogues

item.title: [pi] dialogue maker helps you make dialogues
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“liamp, post:18, topic:431308”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=533984.msg3903797#msg3903797 date=1328033142]
I like this but I don’t like the spacing in it. You could fix that so instead of having it like this:

       case ####:
  sendNpcChat#("#", c.talkingNPC, "name");
  c.nextChat = #;

break;

make it look like this:

case ####:
	sendNpcChat#("#", c.talkingNPC, "name");
	c.nextChat = #;
break;

[/quote]

hmmm it still works tho[/quote]
In what is this written?

item.title: [pi] dialogue maker helps you make dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I like this but I don’t like the spacing in it. You could fix that so instead of having it like this:

       case ####:
  sendNpcChat#("#", c.talkingNPC, "name");
  c.nextChat = #;

break;

make it look like this:

case ####:
	sendNpcChat#("#", c.talkingNPC, "name");
	c.nextChat = #;
break;
